`precision`:: Spatial resolution (in space units). Two locations are considered identical if their distance is below this value.

`units`:: The measurement unit for distances and coordinates in this space

`guardAreaWidth`:: The width of a guard area around the space used to define an observation window

`observationWindow`:: A rectangle defining which part of the space is visible
